entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
